thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 17 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Top Choice Medical Investment to finance 250 mln yuan to invest in ophthalmic hospital investment management firm

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Top Choice Medical Investment to finance 250 mln yuan to invest in ophthalmic hospital investment management firm

organizations.name: reuters) - top choice medical investment co inc

text:
Jan 17(Reuters) - Top Choice Medical Investment Co Inc
* Says co plans to finance 250 million yuan from Zhejiang branch of Industrial and Commercial Bank of China to invest in a Zhejiang-based ophthalmic hospital investment management firm, with interest rate of 5.9 percent per annum
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/U9kkDo
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
